definition: lit. vitality a hundredfold (idiom); refreshed/one's vigor thoroughly restored

sentences.english: Worse than the hunger, say local leaders, is the thirst.
sentences.chinese: 但在當地頭領看來，比飢餓可怕百倍的是乾渴。

sentences.english: And half lethal dose was several hundred folds than the clinical dose.
sentences.chinese: 半數致死量是推薦臨牀劑量的幾百倍。

sentences.english: Compared with the common Sagnac interferometers , its dynamic range is extended.
sentences.chinese: 與一般干涉儀相比其工作動態範圍可以擴大數百倍。

sentences.english: Because they have been defeated, the energy of their resistance has increased a hundred and a thousandfold .
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們已經被打敗，他們反抗的力量會增大千百倍。

sentences.english: There radon concentrations will severalfold to hundred times increasing when using spring water in the hotel rooms.
sentences.chinese: 氡濃度比沒有使用溫泉水時高出幾倍甚至幾百倍。

sentences.english: I will greet the new sun with confidence.
sentences.chinese: 我將信心百倍，迎接新的太陽。

sentences.english: Then Isaac sowed in that land, and received in the same year an hundredfold: and the LORD blessed him.
sentences.chinese: 以撒在那地耕種，那一年有百倍的收成。

sentences.english: It is one of those niggly ones. He came back and had a recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 現在重要的是他受傷了，但他還會精神百倍的歸隊。

sentences.english: The breakfast that abounds suddenly can make you daylong mental hundredfold .
sentences.chinese: 一頓豐富的早餐會讓你一整天都精神百倍。

sentences.english: His long trek up the hillside had been repaid a hundredfold.
sentences.chinese: 他的長途跋涉得到了百倍的補償。

sentences.english: Worse, a hundred times worse, she had lost sight of the Red Keep.
sentences.chinese: 真糟糕，糟糕百倍的是，她看不見紅堡了。

sentences.english: Molly looked at confidence one hundred times MiaoQing, heart also rises with concern.
sentences.chinese: 莫莉看着信心百倍的苗青，心中也升起陣陣擔憂。

sentences.english: In viewing the future, LingYi People are full of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 展望未來，林一人信心百倍。

sentences.english: Full of confidence and zealousness, I want to do some foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 我信心百倍，滿腔熱忱要把外貿做出來。

sentences.english: Its lens, nobigger than a small raindrop, magnified objects hundreds of times.
sentences.chinese: 它的鏡頭大不過小雨滴，卻能使物體放大數百倍。

sentences.english: The person was really too preoccupied to this flavor, just smelt morale a hundredfold.
sentences.chinese: 這香味實在太吸引人了，只是聞一聞就精神百倍。

definition: eager to excel/eager to get ahead in life/strong-minded
not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: fall short by a large amount
